net.happybrackets.core.instruments

Class WaveModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.happybrackets.core.instruments.WaveModule

  • public class WaveModule
extends java.lang.Object
    An encapsulated class for generating a basic wave player

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WaveModule()
      Create a Wavelplayer with default parameters of 440hz, 0.1 gain with a sine wave buffer

    • Constructor Detail

      • WaveModule

        public WaveModule()
        Create a Wavelplayer with default parameters of 440hz, 0.1 gain with a sine wave buffer

      • WaveModule

        public WaveModule(double frequency,
                  double gain,
                  net.beadsproject.beads.data.Buffer waveform_type)
        Create a basic waveplayer for generating simple wave playback
        Parameters:
        frequency - the initial frequency
        gain - the initial volume. A value of 0.1 is a good value
        waveform_type - the type of waveform to use, eg, sine, square, etc...

      • WaveModule

        public WaveModule(net.beadsproject.beads.core.UGen frequency_control,
                  double gain,
                  net.beadsproject.beads.data.Buffer waveform_type)
        Create a basic waveplayer for generating simple wave playback
        Parameters:
        frequency_control - the Object that will control the frequency
        gain - the initial volume. A value of 0.1 is a good value
        waveform_type - the type of waveform to use, eg, sine, square, etc...

      • WaveModule

        public WaveModule(double frequency,
                  net.beadsproject.beads.core.UGen gain_control,
                  net.beadsproject.beads.data.Buffer waveform_type)
        Create a basic waveplayer for generating simple wave playback
        Parameters:
        frequency - the initial frequency
        gain_control - the Object that will control the gain
        waveform_type - the type of waveform to use, eg, sine, square, etc...

      • WaveModule

        public WaveModule(net.beadsproject.beads.core.UGen frequency_control,
                  net.beadsproject.beads.core.UGen gain_control,
                  net.beadsproject.beads.data.Buffer waveform_type)
        Create a basic waveplayer for generating simple wave playback
        Parameters:
        frequency_control - the Object that will control the frequency
        gain_control - the Object that will control the gain
        waveform_type - the type of waveform to use, eg, sine, square, etc...
